Title: Mimic StackOverFlow Q&A Site using Silverlight
Description:
Purpose of this project is to study and learn Silverlight by developing Silverlight application mimic StackOverFlow site.

In this project, following skill set will be used :
 - Silverlight 4.0
 - Entity Framework 4.0 (Code First CTP)
 - WCF Service
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The purpose of this project is to study and learn Silverlight by developing web application mimic StackOverFlow site.

In this project, we use following skills :
- Silverlight 4.0
- Entity Framework 4.0 (Code First CTP)
- WCF
